title: Apple Announces New Mac Studio With M4 Max and M3 Ultra Chips, Thunderbolt 5, and More
content:
Apple today announced that it has updated the Mac Studio with M4 Max and M3 Ultra chip options, Thunderbolt 5 ports, and more.


The new Mac Studio is available to pre-order starting today, and it will launch on Wednesday, March 12. In the U.S., pricing starts at $1,999.
